doc.title: Repetitive Strain
doc.plot: On the verge of being fired, JIM, a lazy employee commits worker's compensation fraud in the hopes of saving his job. Jim's fed up manager JEAN, tries to convince the naive human resource representative of their company KATHY, that Jim is up to no good. Fearing possible litigation, and aware of the gullible DR. ROBINSON's prognosis concerning Jim, Kathy is too cautious not to take Jim's claims of job related injury seriously. However wily Jean, and skeptic Kathy hatch a plan to catch Jim red handed. Their scheme involves an exceptionally apt insurance fraud investigator BARBARA and is sure to throw Jim for a loop. Could this be the end to Jim's lucky streak of evading consequence?
